content:
Revel in this rustic, but modern villa boasting a gas fireplace, living room with comfortable seating, two bedrooms air conditioning, two color televisions, two bathrooms, sauna and jacuzzi-style tub.

2 Queen Beds
1100 square feet / rate is for 2-4 people

STARTING FROM $219 PER NIGHT
* Excluding taxes, $3 per person per night Recreation Fee and 19% Service Charge. Two-night minimum stay required in the villas.
